channel.title: Another if my noob mistakes?
channel.description:
Hi,
I'll make this as quick as I can because I know i'm a painfully useless member of these forums. Basically, when I try and run my server, this happens:
[code]blahblahblahscapre is now... finally online! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 16 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) [/code]
Yes, I have hidden my server name.
Anyway, since this has started showing up, people cannot login ever as they are 'already logged in'. Not even I can.
Thanks for the help with my noob mistake, Retard

item.title: Another if my noob mistakes?
item.dc:creator: @Retard_Monkey Retard Monkey
item.description:
@Retard_Monkey wrote:

That would make sense much. I changed lots of item bonuses yesterday. I’ll check it out, thanks LOADS.

Knew it was a noob mistake, im just too noob to know what.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 02, 2008, 10:59:51 am[/size][hr]Im still getting the same error when I try and log on, and my runserver still has the same message.
I probably just missed some items out.

Read full topic

item.title: Another if my noob mistakes?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

you’re using spaces not tabs in item.cfg

Read full topic
